New Records: LeBron James recorded his 113th career triple-double with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists
Key Match Events: Lakers' 21-0 run to start the fourth quarter
Anthony Davis' game-sealing 3-pointer and free throw in the final minute
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James' comments on not needing to score aggressively for the entire game
Coach JJ Redick's emphasis on the team's construction and LeBron's luxury of having an MVP-caliber player next to him
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James' pride in his team's effort and the 3-0 start to the season
Anthony Davis' praise for LeBron's greatness and consistency
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis' third straight 30-point game, tying a franchise record
The Lakers' 3-0 start to the season
